name: Wakazozo!
description:
A silly, local multiplayer game where you joust on pogo sticks! As frogs!

Has nothing to do with the Ludum Dare 35 theme because I didn't really like it.

Controls

Mostly in-game.

  • When in-game, press Esc to close the game.
  • Use +/- to increase or decrease the volume respectively.
Credits
  • A game created by George Baron (@PixelbearGames)
